sentences.en: A blizzard was blasting great drifts of snow across the lake.
sentences.cn: 暴风雪夹着大团的积雪吹过湖面。

sentences.en: Fifty soldiers were taking an early morning bathe in a nearby lake.
sentences.cn: 清晨,50名士兵正在附近的湖里游泳.

sentences.en: He owned a fancy house out on Lake Agawam.
sentences.cn: 他在阿格瓦姆湖畔拥有一座豪宅。

sentences.en: He rowed her ashore and then continued trolling around the lake.
sentences.cn: 他拢岸让她下船，然后继续悠闲地在湖上划着。

sentences.en: He tramped hurriedly round the lake towards the garden.
sentences.cn: 他匆匆地迈着沉重的步伐绕过湖边向花园走去。

sentences.en: I once went camping at Lake Darling with a friend.
sentences.cn: 我曾和一位朋友在达令湖畔露营。

sentences.en: If you look, you'll see what was a lake.
sentences.cn: 你看一眼就能知道什么叫湖。

sentences.en: Mining would pollute the lake and denude the forest.
sentences.cn: 采矿会污染湖水，毁掉森林。

sentences.en: Most of the mouth of the cave was submerged in the lake.
sentences.cn: 洞口大半都淹没在湖里。

sentences.en: The smaller lake ranges from five to fourteen feet in depth.
sentences.cn: 小一些的湖深度从5英尺到14英尺不等。

sentences.en: The view of lake and plunging cliffs seduces visitors.
sentences.cn: 湖光旖旎、峭壁峥嵘，游客们被深深吸引了。

sentences.en: The water level in Lake Taihu has reached record levels.
sentences.cn: 太湖水位达到了历史最高值。

sentences.en: The whole lake was rimmed with thick beds of reeds.
sentences.cn: 整片湖都被密密层层的芦苇围了起来。

sentences.en: There was swimming and sailing down on the lake.
sentences.cn: 有人在湖上游泳和扬帆。

sentences.en: We were walking in single file to the lake.
sentences.cn: 我们正排成一列朝湖边走去。

phrases.tran_cn: 人工湖；水库；人工蓄水池
n. 火山口形成的深湖
贝加尔湖（世界上容量最大，最深的淡水湖）
伊利湖（北美洲五大湖之一）
触不到的恋人（电影名，又名情流恋屋、跳越时空的情书）

trans.tran_cn: 湖，深红色颜料，胭脂红，[化]色淀
trans.tran_en: a large area of water surrounded by land
a large area of water surrounded by land
